briefdescription.para: Register Audio callbacks for a stream.

detaileddescription.para: Register Audio callbacks for a stream.
Only one callback structure can be registered, and attempting to registering more than one will result in an error.

simplesect.para: 0 in case of success or negative value in case of error.

detaileddescription.para: May only unregister a callback structure that has previously been registered by bt_audio_unicast_server_register_cb().

simplesect.para: 0 in case of success or negative value in case of error.

briefdescription.para: Helper to declare elements of bt_codec_data arrays.

detaileddescription.para: This macro is mainly for creating an array of struct bt_codec_data elements inside bt_codec which is then passed to the likes of bt_audio_stream_config or bt_audio_stream_reconfig.

parameterdescription.para: Codec Specific Data in LVT format
Codec Specific Metadata in LVT format

memberdef.name: BT_CODEC_META_CONTEXT_ANY
